q: make-up artist Mezhgan Hussainy last February, admits he struggles to relate to very young kids, but would love to have youngsters of his own to play games with. Simon Cowell 's Aging Fears. He said: I worry about it- because of my age. When I was a youngster, my dad used to play soccer and games with me. And I worry that if I was 70. Also, if children could be born at the age of five I'd quite like that. I like them at that age when they can talk and understand. I'm not sure I could deal with the whole "ga ga goo' thing. But I genuinely like kids. Simon Cowell also admitted Mezhgan, 36, has "softened" him and has finally made him think about settling down forever. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Former Secretary of State Colin Powell says he is voting for Barack Obama . "He has both style and substance. I think he is a transformational figure," Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Barack Obama displayed a steadiness. Showed intellectual vigor. He has a definitive way of doing business that will do us well, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell , a retired US general and a Republican, was once seen as a possible presidential candidate himself. "In addition to creating the jobs of the future, clean energy benefits the U.S. economy by ultimately making energy costs more affordable for consumers- especially if their dollars stay in America," Sergio Marchionne said. Hydraulic hybrid vehicle technology is one more promising path worth pursuing in the effort to reduce our carbon footprint, and we are excited to partner with the EPA to push forward on this track. EPA's hydraulic hybrid technology, developed in the agency's lab in Ann Arbor, Michigan, is coming into use in large delivery and refuse trucks across the country. had no legal claim to it. The SCA, which Zahi Hawass heads, said in an email that its request had been approved by both Prime Minister Ahmed Nazif and the Egyptian ministry of culture. This request is a natural consequence of Egypt's long-standing policy of seeking the restitution of all archaeological and historical artefacts that have been taken illicitly out of the country, it said. Zahi Hawass has campaigned to repatriate several pharaonic treasures in recent years, including the Rosetta Stone now in the British Museum. The bust dates back to the time of the 14th century
